Published on Friday, 30 June 2017
(Pasay City). Electric vehicles (EV) are the future of motoring and the Department of Energy (DOE) under Secretary Alfonso Cusi has assured industry stakeholders of its full support for the continued development of EVs or e-vehicles in the country. PHOTO RELEASE: Towards A Reliable Power System In Mindanao Published on Friday, 30 June 2017 (Davao City). Last Wednesday, 28 June, the Department of Energy together with the Philippine Electricity Market Corp. (PEMC) held a ceremonial, symbolic and historical switched on during the official launch of the Mindanao Wholesale Electricity Spot Market (WESM) which provides a competitive and tr... Read more Cusi Vows Long-Term Energy Security in Mindanao Published on Wednesday, 28 June 2017
(Davao City). With the launch of the Mindanao Wholesale Electricity Spot Market (WESM) today (28 June), Energy Secretary Alfonso G. Cusi pledged his full commitment to President Duterte’s people-centered policies and government’s long term economic vision for the country. Finally, WESM Mindanao Launched Wednesday Published on Tuesday, 27 June 2017 (Taguig City). Some 11 years since being established in Luzon and over six years since taking a foothold in the Visayas, the Wholesale Electricity Spot (WESM) will come to Mindanao on Wednesday, 28 June 2017.
